description: Only suppliers prequalified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to bid on this requirement.
full_summary:
=============================================

**Title:** Spectrograph
**Title (French):** Spectrographe

**Notice Number:** cb-6858-34506269
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** SA-E60PV-19EQUI / Solicitation 23-58054

**Publication Date:** June 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 14, 2023, 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** July 14, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 16, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** October 6, 2023

**Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Contracting Entity:**
National Research Council Canada (NRC-CNRC)
1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Johnathon Gillis, (343) 552-4124,  [johnathon.gillis@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:johnathon.gillis@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

**Notice Description:**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC-CNRC) invites only prequalified suppliers under the terms and conditions of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI to submit a bid for a spectrograph procurement. Suppliers interested in bidding must be prequalified under the aforementioned arrangement.

The solicitation is being conducted through a selective tendering process, where eligible bidders will be contacted directly by the Contracting Authority from the NRC-CNRC.

**Key Requirements:**

* Suppliers must be prequalified under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI
* Suppliers must comply with the terms and conditions of the supply arrangement
* The procurement is limited to the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Trade Agreements:** The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Closing Date:** The tender closing date is July 14, 2023, at 14:00:
